document.full_text: healthcare funds posted nearly 20 percent gains over the past year -- and have outperformed all other sectors in 2011 -- but many investors may have missed out on the profits as they worried over the fallout from the u.s. healthcare overhaul.
document.title: many investors lost out on healthcare gains
lines_and_colors: healthcare funds posted nearly 20 percent gains over the past year -- and have outperformed all other sectors in 2011 -- but many investors may have missed out on the profits as they worried over the fallout from the u.s. healthcare overhaul.
